name: Amulet of the Sun God
description: A magnificent golden amulet in the shape of a stylized sun with rays extending in all directions. Ancient hieroglyphs are etched around the central sun disk, and the gold seems to hold an inner fire that never dims. A heavy golden chain allows it to be worn around the neck. The amulet radiates warmth and authority, marking its wearer as one blessed by the ancient solar deities.

properties.sun_blessing: protection from dark magic and undead
properties.leadership: inspires confidence and respect in others
properties.desert_mastery: immunity to heat exhaustion and dehydration
properties.light_creation: can create brilliant daylight in darkness
properties.artifact_power: grows stronger with faith and noble deeds

use_description: You raise the Amulet of the Sun God and it blazes with brilliant golden light, banishing darkness and filling you with divine confidence and protection.
